name: Unwind (Brackey's 2020 Game Jam Entry)
description:
Unwind is my entry for the 2020 Brackey's Game Jam! The theme was Rewind.

In Unwind you play as a wind-up toy robot. Every action you perform spins down your wind-up crank. Special places in the world  allow  you to re-wind your crank and continue on your  way.

The game is very incomplete as I ended up getting sick about halfway through the week and lost a couple days of development time. All in all I'm pretty satisfied with the way the game plays and I'm just very excited to make my first game jam submission!

Anyways, thanks for stopping by!

Controls:

Move - Arrow Keys, WASD or Gamepad Left Joystick

Jump - Z, Spacebar or Gamepad A

Dash - X, Left Control or Gamepad X

Pause - Escape or Gamepad Menu
